channel.title: Gah!
channel.description:
Been on this for hours.... Attempting to make my NPCDrops class load Custom Charm Drops.... Getting this error

item.title: Gah!
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRSPS EclipseRSPS
item.description:
@EclipseRSPS wrote:

Been on this for hours… Attempting to make my NPCDrops class load Custom Charm Drops… Getting this error

[code]java.io.WriteAbortedException: writing aborted; java.io.NotSerializableException: com.rs.utils.NPCDrops
at java.io.ObjectInputStream.readObject0(Unknown Source)

at com.rs.net.decoders.LoginPacketsDecoder.decode(LoginPacketsDecoder.java:34)
